name: Ragnarok Defense Force
description:
Ragnarok Defense Force The end of the world is upon us! Play as Thor Odinson and fight off hordes of Norse enemies as you try and prevent the inevitable end of the world. Don't get caught by Loki or Hel, who both show up at random intervals to change your control scheme and force you to readjust.

Endless action! - play for high scores, the game does not end until you lose.

Fast Paced! - Easy to pickup, simple controls, difficult to master.
